ygData.subject: Re: Screaming Terror gets an overhaul!
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh well I ve been using it all day in Lower guk and have no gotten a single resist. Naeeldar ... From: Mark Muller  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Heh well I've been using it all day in Lower guk and have no gotten a single
resist.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Muller <markm@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 5:50 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Screaming Terror gets an overhaul!


>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>> All I can say is... WOW... if this actually works and isn't resisted by
>> greens 50% of the time this is one sweet change. Actually have something
>> really useful to contribute to a group. Unfortunately I am going away on
>> vacation tomorrow morning so I won't have much time to play with it until
>> next week =(
>
>Looking at Caster's Realm, I'm not a happy soul stealer...it seems that
>screaming terror will fall under the same category as mesmerize as far as
>resists...prime stat for lowering resists on mes? That's right...every
>necro's lowest stat...charisma. Hope you didn't plan on actually *using*
>this spell anytime soon :P
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
